scripts.serve:main: yarn run clean && parcel serve src/index.html -p 3000 --no-source-maps
scripts.serve:slider: yarn run clean && parcel serve src/slider.html -p 3001 --no-source-maps
scripts.build:main: yarn run clean && parcel build src/index.html --no-source-maps
scripts.build:slider: yarn run clean && parcel build src/slider.html --no-source-maps
